name: gemini-translate-extension
description: Google Gemini API ile güçlü çeviri eklentisi - Cross-browser compatibility

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox && npm run package:safari
scripts.package:chrome: zip -r dist/gemini-translate-chrome.zip manifest.json cross-browser popup content background options assets utils -x *.md tests/*
scripts.package:firefox: zip -r dist/gemini-translate-firefox.zip manifest.firefox.json cross-browser popup content background options assets utils -x *.md tests/*
scripts.package:safari: zip -r dist/gemini-translate-safari.zip manifest.safari.json cross-browser popup content background options assets utils -x *.md tests/*

author: Gemini Translate Team
